verses.plain: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.

tokens.t: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.

verses.plain: Now the Jews’ feast of tabernacles was at hand.

tokens.t: Now the Jews’ feast of tabernacles was at hand.

verses.plain: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judæa, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.

tokens.t: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judæa, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.

verses.plain: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.

tokens.t: For
no man
doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.

verses.plain: For neither did his brethren believe in him.

tokens.t: For neither did his brethren believe in him.

verses.plain: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.

tokens.t: Then Jesus said unto them,
My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.

verses.plain: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.

tokens.t: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.

verses.plain: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.

tokens.t: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.

verses.plain: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.

tokens.t: When he had said these words unto them, he abode
in Galilee.

verses.plain: ¶ But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.

tokens.t: ¶ But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.

verses.plain: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?

tokens.t: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?

verses.plain: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

tokens.t: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

verses.plain: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.

tokens.t: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.

verses.plain: ¶ Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.

tokens.t: ¶ Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.

verses.plain: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?

tokens.t: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?

verses.plain: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.

tokens.t: Jesus answered them, and said,
My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.

verses.plain: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

tokens.t: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or
I speak of myself.

verses.plain: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

tokens.t: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

verses.plain: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?

tokens.t: Did not Moses give you the law, and
none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?

verses.plain: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?

tokens.t: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?

verses.plain: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.

tokens.t: Jesus answered and said unto them,
I have done one work, and ye all marvel.

verses.plain: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.

tokens.t: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.

verses.plain: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?

tokens.t: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?

verses.plain: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

tokens.t: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

verses.plain: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?

tokens.t: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?

verses.plain: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?

tokens.t: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?

verses.plain: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.

tokens.t: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.

verses.plain: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.

tokens.t: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying,
Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.

verses.plain: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.

tokens.t: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.

verses.plain: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.

tokens.t: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.

verses.plain: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?

tokens.t: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this
hath done?

verses.plain: ¶ The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.

tokens.t: ¶ The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.

verses.plain: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.

tokens.t: Then said Jesus unto them,
Yet a little while am I with you, and
I go unto him that sent me.

verses.plain: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.

tokens.t: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find
: and where I am,
ye cannot come.

verses.plain: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?

tokens.t: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?

verses.plain: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?

tokens.t: What
saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find
: and where I am,
ye cannot come?

verses.plain: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

tokens.t: In the last day, that great
of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying,
If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

verses.plain: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

tokens.t: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

verses.plain: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

tokens.t: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet
; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

verses.plain: ¶ Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.

tokens.t: ¶ Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.

verses.plain: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?

tokens.t: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?

verses.plain: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?

tokens.t: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?

verses.plain: So there was a division among the people because of him.

tokens.t: So there was a division among the people because of him.

verses.plain: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.

tokens.t: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.

verses.plain: ¶ Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?

tokens.t: ¶ Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?

verses.plain: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

tokens.t: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

verses.plain: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?

tokens.t: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?

verses.plain: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?

tokens.t: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?

verses.plain: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.

tokens.t: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.

verses.plain: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

tokens.t: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

verses.plain: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?

tokens.t: Doth our law judge
man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?

verses.plain: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.

tokens.t: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.

verses.plain: And every man went unto his own house.

tokens.t: And every man went unto his own house.
